title: CreditIndexReferenceInformation
description: A class defining a Credit Default Swap Index.

indexSeries.description: A CDS index series identifier, e.g. 1, 2, 3 etc.

indexAnnexVersion.description: A CDS index series version identifier, e.g. 1, 2, 3 etc.

indexAnnexDate.description: A CDS index series annex date.

indexAnnexSource.description: A CDS index series annex source.

tranche.description: This element contains CDS tranche terms.

settledEntityMatrix.description: Used to specify the Relevant Settled Entity Matrix when there are settled entities at the time of the trade.

indexFactor.description: Index Factor is the index version factor or percent, expressed as an absolute decimal value between 0 and 1, that multiplied by the original notional amount yields the notional amount covered by the seller of protection.

seniority.description: Seniority of debt instruments comprising the index.

indexName.description: The name of the index expressed as a free format string with an associated scheme.

indexId.description: An index identifier (e.g. RED pair code).
